item.title: Using AI to automate foreign key discovery - Erik Edin
item.description: When setting up a data warehouse, understanding the relationships between various objects—both within a system and across systems—is essential. Foreign keys are the connective tissue, linking tables and datasets. When dealing with undocumented legacy systems, discovering these relationships manually can be tedious. Automated foreign key discovery, aided by AI, helps you get up to speed […]

item.title: Keyset Cursors, Not Offsets, for Postgres Pagination
item.description:
We're building Sequin, a Postgres CDC tool to streams and queues like Kafka, SQS, HTTP endpoints, and more. Efficient, correct pagination is paramount for our backfill process, so we use keyset cursors extensively.
You've probably heard about the limitations of offset/limit in Postgres. There are two primary concerns with

item.title: Easily Upgrade .NET MAUI & Blazor Hybrid apps to .NET 9 in Minutes
item.description:
.NET 9 is here and with it comes some sweet new features and performance enhancements for .NET MAUI. Let's get your .NET MAUI apps upgraded in just a few minutes and talk about some of the more substantial updates to consider.
Links: .NET 9 Announcement: https://devblogs.microsoft.com/dotnet/announcing-dotnet-9/ .NET Conf Keynote: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ikSNL-lxolc&list=PLdo4fOcmZ0oXeSG8BgCVru3zQtw_K4ANY What's new in .NET MAUI in .NET 9: https://learn.microsoft.com/dotnet/maui/whats-new/dotnet-9
.NET MAUI Workshop Upgrade: https://github.com/dotnet-presentations/dotnet-maui-workshop/pull/147
Chapters: 00:00 - Intro 01:15 - Upgrading TargetFrameworks and Project Settings 03:30 - Upgrading NuGet Packages 05:25 - Windows Default App Packaging Settings 07:30 - Goodbye MainPage Hello Window 10:15 - Upgrading Alerts 13:00 - Goodbye Frame Hello Border 14:15 - New Styles 15:50 - Wrap-up and final thoughts
Join this channel to get access to perks: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCENTmbKaTphpWV2R2evVz2A/join

item.title: Why do we need redis?
item.description:
Learn how to cancel long-running jobs in .NET the right way. Using Redis and CancellationToken, I’ll show you how to build a system for on-demand cancellations. Simple, clear, and effective!
Join my mailing list: https://mdbouk.com/ Follow me on X: https://x.com/mhdbouk
Don’t forget to like, subscribe, and share this video with your fellow developers.
Happy Coding!
item.author: (Mohamad Dbouk)

item.title: Stop Using Exceptions in C#! Here’s Why and What to Do Instead
item.description:
Exceptions in C# are notoriously slow and should be avoided at all cost! If you are using exceptions for normal flow control, you need to watch this video!
By simply using other patterns and practices you can reduce the memory footprint and greatly improve throughput in your applications. If you are custom to using domain exceptions, you need to rethink your decisions and avoid exceptions!
Table of contents: 0:00: Introduction 1:25: Alternatives to exceptions 2:15: Result Pattern 3:25: BenchmarkDotNet 4:24: Comparing different runtimes 5:15: Benchmark results 6:40: Extending the benchmarks 7:04: Final results
Source code available here: https://github.com/fekberg/avoid-exceptions
Check out my course on C# Benchmarking and Profiling: https://www.pluralsight.com/courses/c-sharp-benchmarking-profiling
Follow me on X: @fekberg Follow me on Bluesky: https://bsky.app/profile/fekberg.bsky.social Check out my courses on Pluralsight: https://pluralsight.pxf.io/d1MRK
DISCLAIMER: This video and description contains affiliate links, which means that if you click on one of the links, I may receive a small commission.
item.author: (Filip Ekberg)
